item.description:
Dance to the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra, featuring 21-year old John Stevens on vocals. As a 16-year-old, John finished sixth in the third season of American Idol and is now completing his final year at Berklee before resuming his recording career! Catch him while you can!

The big band plays from 8:30 to 11:00pm, with a half-hour intermission during which time a jazz quartet will perform. Also, there will be a beginner swing dance lesson at 7:30pm. The lesson is a great opportunity for meetup members to meet each other (or at least the meetup members of the opposite sex) because the "followers" rotate through the "leaders" continuously. Meetup members get a special hand stamp at the door so you can identify each other during the lesson.
item.how_to_find_us: Frank will be on stage conducting the band. Elizabeth will be teaching the swing lesson and be available for assistance during the band's first set.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: American Idol Swing Dance in Concord, Mass.
